person.persName: Joshua C. Perkins (Letcher County farmer and soldier)

body.p: A Tennessee-born, Kentucky farmer and soldier. Married to Sarah Perkins. Father of Hannah Amanda Perkins, Mary Polina Perkins, Highby Perkins, John Perkins, and Sarah Perkins. Served as a captain (Co. C) in the Harlan County Battalion of Kentucky State Militia from October 1862 to January 1863.
